name: Spring Planting Planner (By Last Frost Date)
description: Generate indoor start, transplant, and direct sow dates based on your last frost.

name: Fall Planting Planner (By First Frost Date)
description: Plan fall planting and harvest timing before your first frost.

name: Frost Date Finder (ZIP / Postal Code)
description: Look up your average last spring frost and first fall frost dates at the 32°F / 0°C freeze threshold — the baseline used for frost-based planting schedules.

name: GDD Planner (Maturity Before First Frost)
description: Estimate whether a crop can reach maturity before your typical first frost using climate normals growing degree days (GDD).
